casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Roosevelt Andrew (11003)

Dupont, C. J., O’Connell and Lavery, Js.

Argued April 5 decision released April 27, 1993 Linda P. Stambovsky, with whom, on the brief, was Patricia Buck Wolf, for the appellant (defendant). Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were John M. Bailey, state’s attorney, and Rosita M. Creamer, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
